Footer.arweaveNetSite: Zubere ruo ebighi ebi na arweave.net

TimelineContent.heroTitle: Mụ bụ onye guzobere sitere England ma ọ na eme njem na AirBnb n'ofe US/UK/EU. Anya m dị na crypto, startups na ngwapụta software. Mwere mma n'ụlọ ọrụ capital venture na ihe omume.
TimelineContent.timeline2025Description: N'afọ a, m nara oge ịbuo [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops) ma lansị mainnet netwọkụ. Otu n'ime ọmụmụ dị isi ezi ọ mụtara m n'afọ a bụ na startups abụghị naanị gbasara ngwaahịa. Uto na marketing hụ anya dịka mgbe ọ bụ karịa ngwaahịa, ya mere mmalite [ịkwalite isiokwu](/projects#content-creator) na fokus na uto.
TimelineContent.timeline2024Description: Mwere echiche [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops) na [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer) n'afọ a mgbe njem na orimiri n'ambition na Cambridge ebe m nọ na mgbe ahụ. [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) nọ na ihe mmalite ya na ọsọ ọtụtụ chọpụtara ihe pụrụ ichekwa usoro kwuo ihe owu na netwọkụ. Arụkwa m ọrụ dịka Engineering Partner na [AO Ventures](https://aoventures.io). Gbasara m ndị otu na cohort na nyere aka ịkpebisi ihe gbasara onye sonyere na demo day site n'nchikota teknoloji, mechaa gbasara m onwe m na echiche ọhụrụ - [LiquidOps](/projects#liquidops).
TimelineContent.timeline2023Description: Mghọ mma ụlọ ọrụ mma na [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com) ozugbo mgbe seed round ha. Alaghachiri [Wallety](/projects#wallety) grant maka ilekwasi anya na [Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. N'ime oge m nọ ebe a, mebuo [Othent](/projects#othent), Oases na [Subsidise.js](/projects#subsidisejs).
TimelineContent.timeline2022Title: Sonyere Community Labs & kuzie onwe m ịkọwa kod
TimelineContent.timeline2022Description: Mgbe ama m na imuzu na akụkọ nmụ amụ abụghị ihe nwere obi iji dị ka ibu ihe, m tụrụ anya ime ihe imụte ịkọwa kod site n'ihe nile. Mepụtara ike ịmụta ịkọwa kod ọsọ ọtụtụ na mebuo ngwa mma mbụ [Wallety](/projects#wallety). O bụ ihe gbasara ike ma obi ụtọ. Mechaa wedụtara [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) anya na ghọọ ezigbo enyi na m kpebisie onwe m ịsonye ya na [Community Labs](https://communitylabs.com).
TimelineContent.timeline2021Title: Baanyere Crypto VC site n'ụlọ mụ
TimelineContent.timeline2021Description: Enweta m ọrụ ịmụta n'ụlọ ọrụ venture capital crypto site na nkalanma ọnwa na-agara aga. Arụrụ m ọrụ maka ọnwa 3 na-enweghị ụgwọ tupu ha nye m ọrụ nlereanya akwụ ụgwọ, achọ m ruo ọnwa iri na otu. Nara m oge ka m eme mkpa nlerite n'ụbọchị dealflow, deere m ihe n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ investment committee na agbakwunye m na ndị nwere echiche chọrọ iche ụlọ ọrụ ahụ. N'afọ a m gbasara [Polkadot Ambassador](https://polkadot.com/community/ambassador-program) ebe m nyere aka ibuo community na mezu ike IRL London picnic ebe ihe karịrị 100 mmadụ bịa gụnyere ndị otu ecosystem na ndị nwere echiche.
TimelineContent.timeline2020Title: Crypto Teen & ịpụ na drama school
TimelineContent.timeline2020Description: Mgbe m nọ na drama school na [Emil Dale Academy](https://www.emildale.co.uk), malaite Crypto TikTok educational channel nke achọ ịkụziri Gen Z naanị ihe banyere Crypto. Maka iji baanyere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, m kpebisie onwe m inyere ọnwa ikilome 500 ụlọ ọrụ, ụlọ ọrụ investment na ihe gbasara ma ọ bụ na ha ga-anata m dịka onye na-arụ ọrụ ụgwọ. Site na ikilome 500 ụnụ ozi, ihe 6 gbasere. M na-eme Zoom meetings na mmechi ụlọ akwụkwọ site na telefoni ezigbo mmadụ m na-ụlọ akwụkwọ nwere data mgbe m na-ezọ nkuzi maka iche ụlọ ọrụ capital ventures. O bụ oge dị egwu n'elu-elu n'oge ya na ọ na-ado egwu ruo ugbua. N'afọ a m zukọtarikwa ego maka akwụkwọ drama site n'ịnweta ihe ndị mmadụ weghachiri/mụ ka e were gaa na eBay maka ọkwu akwụkwọ mgbe m nweta ihe ọmụmụ site na Gary Vee, o ruru oru!
TimelineContent.timeline2019Description: Sonyere m Ethereum community na 2019 mgbe ọ na-amụte naanị ihe banyere smart contracts.
TimelineContent.timeline2017Description: Mgbe ndị otu m nile na-ere kpi n'ihe emeeme, m na-azụva ekran telefon maka ego.
TimelineContent.photo2025_8: Nọ na SF naanị oge mbụ

AngelPage.title: Angel Investment
introAndElevator: Anya m dị mma ịzụ akụkọ ndị nwere echiche ọhụrụ na-ebu ihe nzuzo ha. Mgbe ọ hụ m obi ike na ụzọ m pụrụ inyere aka karịa naanị ego, anya m dị mma ịbatara n'ile n'ụtụtụ.

Na-edebanye m ego n'etiti **$500 na $5,000** na pre-seed at very early seed rounds. Ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ na-enweghị ego karị, m na-agba mbọ ka mma. Ma ọ bụ nkwado, nrụrụ ngwaahịa, ndụmọdụ teknoloji, ma ọ bụ naanị onye ịgba okwu na mmanụ ọ bụ, lelee ihe ndị ama ama n'okpuru ebe ahụ.

Mkpughe, aga m enwe ọrụ onye guzobere kwa ugbua na m na-atụ anya ka nke ahụ gaa ruo ọtụtụ oge, ya mere m enweghị ike inyeaka portfolio companies ruo ntoonu ogbe. M na-etinye ego naanị n'ụlọ ọrụ na-ebu ngwaahịa n'ebe yom na-arụ ọrụ ugbua ma ọ bụ ebuo na gara aga, ya mere m pụrụ inyere aka n'ụzọ mkpasa vụ. Hụ ndị ka mma [angel investing disclosures](/disclosures).
AngelPage.helpTitle: Ihe ndị ama ama m emere nke nwere ike inyere gị aka
helpItems: M enweghị ike ịkpebisi gị na mmanụ iwu/akụkọ, ma m pụrụ nye gị aka n'ọbụ nke nwere ike inyere gị aka — ndị omegbuawu, ndị nkọ, na ndị ọrụ (at gba mbọ ka hụ na ị maara na ị anaghị enwerịkwa ego karị). Ruo ugbua m guzobere 4 limited companies na UK na 1 Delaware C corporation.
Kuzie onwe m ịbụ fullstack developer site n'internet
Ijikọ obere ndị otu nke pụrụ ịgawa ngwa ngwa
Mechie ọtụtụ fundraising rounds site na VCs, accelerators, grant foundations, na decentralised blockchain treasuries
Arụrụ m ọrụ na startups/VCs/corporates at nwere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ihe nile, gụnyere CEO, engineer, analyst, nwere COO responsibilities at bụrụ private software contractor
Dịka ị pụrụ ịhụ site na websaịtị m, anya m dị mma ị gbua aka n'ihe. O bụ ike mma nke m nwere na m na-atụ anya ka m nyeaka gị imụta/idụ ya.
Lansị waitlist nke nwere ihe ọtụtụ ngalaba na tolitere na $55m n'obi kọmitị
Buoo/zụzo/ lansị ọtụtụ ngwaahịa na startup na corporate environments
Mee pitch decks, pitches, na business plans na-adị mma na n'ụzọ adịghị mma
AngelPage.pressureTitle: M na-anata mmanụ n'okpuru mmanụ na mezie ha
pressureItems: Azụva 2 big black swan events na live mainnet DeFi protocol
Anọ n'ime 3 big crypto bear markets
Ngwa ụzọ n'ihu ndị mmadụ dị ndụ/online na mebi na TOTALLY fluffed speeches
Zubere IP, rere IP, at nweta ụlọ ọrụ
Zụrụ ndị otu na tinye na ewere ndị otu
Rụrụ ọrụ na akụkọ, ndị omegbuawu, freelancers, na marketing firms
Nyere ụnụ ozi okirikiri na ụlọ ọrụ/ndị mmadụ na-agwa ihe (n'ụbọchị ugbua anya m dị na warm intros)
Kwesiri ịkwazọ ndị mmadụ ka mezie mmanụ dị nkụ, na-abụ mgbe ọtụtụ ihe ọ bụ nke siri ike
Kwesiri ịnye onye 1-1 ṅmakọ adịghị mma na nwa akụọ ya ọtụtụ oge
Ewepụrụ m n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dịka onye crypto guzobere
Guziguo na agbochie ndị na-azụ ụlọ ọrụ & ndị guzobere ọzọ na-azụ
Rụrụ m ọrụ na etu ụlọ ọrụ mma, rụrụ m n'ụlọ ọrụ njọ, zụrụ m ndị mma na azụrụ m nke m na-arụ ọrụ ọtụtụ oge
N'ụlọ ọrụ mụm bụ actor. M pụrụ inyere gị aka ka ị lụta onye mmadụ na social media content na demo day pitches
Nwere successful VC pitches na really really bad ones
Mkpe na sonyere hackathons (ka m ejebeghị otu oge, loser)
Ama m ụzọ e si zụ ngwaahịa na ụzọ e si eji ngwa dịka Figma na Webflow
AngelPage.mistakesTitle: Ihe omume nkwado m emere nke m achọ inwe ka ị ghara ịme
mistakesItems: Nebawo ihe karịrị $50k USD na ego iwu maka funding round nke nwere ike ịbụ $5k
Nebawo $75k USD n'ihe nlerite maka pre-product-market-fit ngwaahịa
Nanafu ọnwa nile bubuo ngwaahịa ma ọ naghị lekwas anya na uto na marketing
Sịrị ihe nkọ arụmụka nke bibiworo ego mụ nile na duodụ m n'ime mgborógwu na -$26k net worth na mgborógwu overnight
Absolụtlụ bibisara credit score na financial nke m onwe m dịka onye guzobere, mechaa wughachiri ya
Ichefu ihe ụgwọ nke ọla na ụzọ ha na-agba
Tufu ihe nnari na ihe ọtụtụ ego site n'ụgwọ site na nlemọ akpọkpọ site na iji software adị elu
Mepụtara na tufu onwe m ego
AngelPage.ctaText: Anya m dị ka m ga-anụ maka ya.
AngelPage.astroDescription: Astro na-emee blockchain liquidity management dị mfe dịka stablecoin issuer.
AngelPage.velaventuresDescription: Web3 venture studio n'azụ ụlọ ọrụ dịka [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com), [Vento](https://ventoswap.com/?tab=swap) na [AO Sync](https://github.com/vela-ventures/ao-sync-sdk).
AngelPage.upshotDescription: Ụlọ ọrụ mbụ n'ulọ nma high-stakes prediction card, buuo na Base ecosystem.

content.content: Ibe a nwere ihe mkpughe dị mkpa banyere ọrụ investment angel m. Biko lelee ozi ahụ nke ọma tupu ikpọkọtaụ m banyere ohere investment.
Personal Capital Naanị

M na-etinye ego mụ onwe. M abụghị **not** ụlọ ọrụ capital venture, m abụghị **not** jikọọ ụlọ ọrụ, na m abụghị **not** natanụ capital site n'aka ndị limited partners (LPs) ma ọ bụ ndị ọzọ na-ego. Mkpebi investment nile mụ naanị mere site n'ụmụ ego m.
Abụghị Ọnụ ọgụgụ Investment

Ihe ọbụla na websaịtị ahụ abụghị kwenyenụ ka investment, iwu, nkọ, ihe nkọ ma ọ bụ ọrụ-ndụ. M abụghị **not** kwado ma ọ bụ ụzọ site na Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) ma ọ bụ ndị ọzọ na-eme iwu. Mkpebi investment ọbụla nke ị mere abụ nke gị.
Abụghị Fiduciary Duty
M ekweghị fiduciary duty onye guzobere ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ m na-etinye ego n'ime karịa ihe e weere n'ụdịdị investment ozi. M bụ onye ego, abụghị ọkpụkpụ, onye izu ume ma ọ bụ fiduciary.
Abụghị Solicitation
Ihe ọbụla na websaịtị ahụ abụghị solicitation, ọrụ ma ọ bụ ndụmọdụ iji ego tinye na ụlọ ọrụ ọbụla, security ma ọ bụ ọrụ investment. Ozi ọbụla banyere portfolio companies m maka ozi naanị.
Abụghị Garantị nke Investment
Ikpọkọtaụ m ma ọ bụ inyere m pitch abụghị na-ekweri na m ga-etinye ego. M na-ele ezi ohere ma etinye ego n'obere ụlọ ọrụ ọ bụla kwa afọ (max 1-2).
Ngalaba dị nta

Aga m enwe ọrụ onye guzobere kwa ugbua na m na-atụ anya ka nke ahụ gaa ruo ọtụtụ oge, ya mere m enweghị ike inyeaka portfolio companies ruo ntoonu ogbe. M na-etinye ego naanị n'ụlọ ọrụ na-ebu ngwaahịa n'ebe yom na-arụ ọrụ ugbua ma ọ bụ ebuo na gara aga, ya mere m pụrụ inyere aka n'ụzọ mkpasa vụ.
Abụghị Ọrụ Advisory

M apụghị ọkpụkpụ ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ ndị guzobere. M na-eche na advisors abụ adịghị n'ihe (kedu ma ọ bụ maka late-stage companies dị nma) — [lelee Steve Jobs ọ na-akọ ihe ọ bụ ](/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-c4CNB80SRc). M naanị etinye ego na ndị guzobere na echiche m chọ ịnwa ọrụ na m na-eche na m pụrụ inyere aka ibuo.
Early Stage Focus

M maara na aga m abụghị uru na ndị guzobere n'ọnụ. Aga m enwe ọrụ early stage na m pụrụ inyere aka karị ma ọ bụ ndị na-amalite (tupu Series A). Ma ọ bụ na gị bụ onye guzobere n'ọnụ na ị na-eche na m nwere ike ịnyere aka, anya m ka dị mma.
Tax Considerations
Ihe nkọ ọbụla akọwapụ (dịka SEIS ma ọ bụ EIS) bụ mmetụta nke ihe n'ihe na HMRC iwu. Ị kwesiri ịchọ ọkpụkpụ ihe nkọ onye ibe ibe. M enweghị ihe mkpughe banyere tax status nke investment ọbụla.
Mkpọmkpọ

Ọ bụrụ na ị na-ekokarị mkpọmkpọ ozi na mụ, m ga-eme ya na nlekọta nke ziri ezi, ma m enweghị ike ịkwarịko na-agbaghara mkpọmkpọ. M nwere ike ịpụta echiche yom ọnụ site n'aka ndị guzobere ọzọ. Atụ ozi abụghị mkpọmkpọ. Ọ bụrụ na m nweghị aka inwee mkpọmkpọ ozi nke agbanwe agbanwe na gị, m enweghị nchebọ iji mkpọmkpọ ozi nke ị zitere m.
Adịghị Nkwadife n'Otu
M nwere ike ịtinye ego na ụlọ ọrụ na-asụ ụlọ ọrụ ọzọ ma ọ bụ na ụlọ ọrụ ị na-ebu. M enweghị nchebọ ịkpughe ego ọzọ m tinye na gị, na m enweghị nchebọ ịgbachiri ịtinye ego na ụlọ ọrụ na-asụ.
Risk Warning

**Angel investing na early-stage companies nwere mmetụta dị ogologo.** Ị nwere ike ịtụfu ego gị nile. Ọrụ na-emebibelụ abụghị ihe na-egosi ihe nna-emegharị. Ụlọ ọrụ investment nwere ike ịgaa elu ma ọ bụ ala. Early-stage investments abụ ike ịnwere akwụkwọ na ị nwere ike ịereghị akwụkwọ ọtụtụ afọ, ma ọ bụ mgbe ọbụla.

content.title: UK Investor Status
content.content: Aga m bụ **Self-Certified Sophisticated Investor** n'okpuru Financial Services na Markets Act 2000 (Financial Promotion) Order 2005. M kwuo n'ịdị na ọrụ nke arụrụ m n'ụlọ ọrụ mma n'ihe oke ihe ego maka obere na nwa nita enterprises n'afọ abụọ gara aba (dịka contractor maka blockchain accelerator programs na-ebubugo early-stage investment).
content.note: **Maka Ndị Guzobere:** Site na iji akwụkwọ investment ke m, ị na-akwado na ị emele esheshọ nke ziri ezi n'okpuru UK Financial Promotions regime na ị na-eche ihe ziri ezi na ị nọ n'ịkwụchịkwa ịnatụ ozi ahụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ ka m inyocha onyinye mkpọmkpọ tupu iji pitch gị, anya m dị mma ịme ya.

content.content: Ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ajụjụ banyere mkpughe ndị a, biko kpọkọtaụ m na hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Ịkwado Usoro
Site n'iji lorimerjenkins.com ("Saịtị"), ị na-akwado na ị ga-azụ Usoro Ọrụ ("Usoro") ndị a. Ọ bụrụ na ị naghị akwado Usoro ndị a, biko ọ ghara iji Saịtị.
Nkọwa nke Ọrụ
Lorimerjenkins.com bụ saịtị onwe nke nwere Lorimer Jenkins na na-eme. Saịtị ahụ nye ozi banyere ọrụ m, ọrụ, ọrụ angel investment, na isiokwu ọzọ m na-azo.
Iji Saịtị
Iji Nke Ọzọ
Ị na-akwado na ị ga-eji Saịtị naanị maka iwu ziri ezi na n'ụzọ abụghị ụkọ nke ọzọ ma ọ bụ igbachiri ha site n'iji Saịtị. Ihe akọrọ gụnyere, ma ọ naghị abụ naanị ihe ndị a:

items: Ị na-agbalị ịnweta ohere adịghị emeninụ na Saịtị ma ọ bụ ihe ya
Ịnyere ụnyaahụ, malware, ma ọ bụ code ọzọ na-akasị
Iji automated systems (bots, scrapers) na-enweghị ọkwa
Agbalị, igbu ogwu, ma ọ bụ ihe nkọ ndị mmadụ ọzọ
Ụrụ iwu ọbụla ma ọ bụ usoro

content.content: Ohere na Saịtị
M na-edebe ikike iji gbanwee, gbachiri, ma ọ bụ kwụsị Saịtị n'ụbọchị ọbụla na-enweghị ọkwa, igbachiri ohere n'ihe ụfọdụ nke Saịtị, na igbachiri ndị na-azụ Usoro ndị a.
Ozi Angel Investment

Ngalaba angel investment nke Saịtị ahụ maka ozi naanị. Ihe ọbụla na Saịtị abụghị ọnụ ego, ọrụ ịzụ ma ọ bụ rere securities, ma ọ bụ ọnụ ego, iwu, ihe nkọ, ma ọ bụ ọnụ nkọ. M abụghị nkwada ma ọ bụ ụzọ n'aka Financial Conduct Authority (FCA). Biko lelee [angel investing disclosures m](/disclosures) maka ozi ziri ezi.
Nwere Mkpọ Ihe

Ọ bụrụ na a pụghị akọwapụ, ihe nile na Saịtị, gụnyere ma ọ naghị abụ naanị mana, ihe onyonyo, graphics, logos, vidio, na code, bụ nke Lorimer Jenkins na na-echebe copyright, trademark, na ụlọ mma ihe ọzọ.

A na-enye gị ohere dị ụmụ, ekweghị ekweghi, na-agaghi aka ime ka ị nalee na eji Saịtị maka ihe onwe gị, abụghị oge azụmahụ. Ị enweghị ike ịlaghachi, ịkwakọ ma ọ bụ ịlaghachikwa ezi akwụkwọ Saịtị na-enweghị ọkwa, gbanwee ma ọ bụ mee ihe ọzọ site n'ihe, eji akwụkwọ maka azụmahụ, ma ọ bụ ewepụ copyright ma ọ bụ ize ihe mma n'akwụkwọ.
Ịnye Ọkpụkpụ na Ọkọtọ

Ọ bụrụ na ị zite ozi pitch, business plans, ma ọ bụ ozi ọzọ nye m banyere ohere investment mmanụ: ị na-enwe ego nke akwụkwọ gị, ị na-enye m ohere na-ekweghị ekweghi iji lelee na nke na-achikwa akwụkwọ gị, m abụghị nchebọ ịlelee akwụkwọ gị ma ọ bụ ịtinye ego, m nwere ike ịnatụ echiche yom ọnụ site n'aka ndị ọzọ, na ị na-nchebọ iji mkpọmkpọ ozi gị.
Njikọ Njiri

Saịtị ahụ nwere ike ịnweta njikọ na saịtị ndị ọzọ ma ọ bụ akụkụ. Njikọ ndị a maka izi naanị. M abụghị ọkpụkpụ maka ihe, ziri ezi, ma ọ bụ usoro nke saịtị ọzọ, ihe omume ọbụla site n'iji saịtị ọzọ, ma ọ bụ ihe nke saịtị ọzọ.
Mkpacha Nke Warranties

**SAỊTỊ AHỤ ENYE AKWỤKWỌ N'"DỊKA Ọ DỊ" NA "DỊKA MMONWU" N'IỤBỌCHỊ NA WARANTI NKE ỌBỤLA**, ma ọ bụ onwe nke, gụnyere ma ọ naghị abụ naanị waranti nke azụmahụ, ziri ezi maka ihe ụfọdụ, na Saịtị ga-enwe ohere, na-anya anya, ma ọ bụ error-free, ma ọ bụ banyere ziri ezi, nkwado, ma ọ bụ nke ziri ezi nke akwụkwọ.
Igbachiri nke Liability

**N'ụkpọ oke nke iwu na-enye aka, LORIMER JENKINS GA-AGBAGHỊ NCHEBỌ MAKA IHED ỌBỤLA** na-akasị ọnụ, ihe ụfọdụ, nke ụfọdụ, ihe omeme, ma ọ bụ agbalị, ihe ụgwọ, ọrụ, ihe, ma ọ bụ iji, ihe omeme site n'iji Saịtị, ihe nkakaaka investment, ma ọ bụ ihe omeme site n'iziike na ihe ọbụla na Saịtị.
Igbachiri ihe a na-arụ ma ọ naghị abụ naanị ihe iwu na ọ bụrụ na a kpokwutere m ng okwu nke ihe omeme. **N'enweghị ụbọchị ka ihe omeme m ga-agbaghị igbaghara ihe m natapụ iji Saịtị (nke bụ zero).**
Indemnification

Ị na-akwado iji ezi oké, echebe, na eme ka Lorimer Jenkins ma ọ naghị ike ihe, ihe omeme, mmanụ, liabilities, na ihe karị site n'iji Saịtị, ụrụ Usoro ndị a, ụrụ nke ọzọ mmadụ, ihe omeme investment ọbụla, ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ ị zitere.
Nzuzo
Iji Saịtị na-echebwuzie na [Privacy Policy m](/privacy), nke enye akwụkwọ n'Usoro ndị a n'aka.
Gbanwee n'Usoro
M na-edebe ikike gbanwee Usoro ndị a n'ụbọchị ọbụla. Gbanwee ga-arụ ọrụ ozugbo site n'akwụkwọ na ọnụ "Last Updated". Iji Saịtị gị n'ihe omeme gbanwee nke a na-ekwado nke gbanweere Usoro.
Iwu n'Ọmume
Usoro ndị a ga-echebwuzie na ike na-agba akụ nke England na Wales. Ihe ọbụla adịghị mma ga-agbarase n'okwu ziri ezi, na ọ bụrụ na nke ahụ adaghị, ụlọ iwu England na Wales ga-enwe ike emebisi.
Severability
Ọ bụrụ na ihe ụfọdụ nke Usoro ndị a achọpụtachọ na-adịghị ziri ezi ma ọ bụ na-adịghị emebisi, ihe nile nke gara aga ga-enwe ike nile na emebisi.
Kpọkọtaụ
Ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ajụjụ banyere Usoro ndị a, biko kpọkọtaụ m na hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Site n'iji Saịtị, ị na-ekwado na ị legere, gụtara, na akwado ka ị zụze Usoro Ọrụ ndị a.
Mmalite
Ndewo na lorimerjenkins.com ("Saịtị"). Privacy Policy ndị a na-akọwa olee otụtụ Lorimer Jenkins ("m," "mụ," ma ọ bụ "nke m") na-enwe, eji, na-echebe ozi mgbe ị na-eje saịtị ihe onwe gị.
Ozi Nke M Enwe
Ozi A Na-enye Onwe Ya
Mgbe ị na-eje Saịtị, m na-enweta ihe ụfọdụ site na Google Analytics, gụnyere:

items: Saịtị ị ga-aga na oge ị na-azụ n'otu ibe
Saịtị ma ọ bụ mmalite na-azụ
Ụbọchị na oge nke iji gị

content.content: Ozi Nke Ị Na-enye
Saịtị ntị, saịtị a enweghị nke na-enwe ozi site n'aka ndị na-eji forms ma ọ bụ akụkụ, na-echu mma ibe ibe ahụ:

**Angel Investment Enquiries:** Ọ bụrụ na ị kpọkọtaụ m banyere ohere investment angel site na imesezi, m nwere ike ịnatụ na ipaghara ozi nke ị na-ezute, gụnyere aha gị, email adres, ụlọ ọrụ ozi, pitch akwụkwọ, na ihe ọbụla n'ime ọkọtọ gị.
Olee Otụtụ Iji Ozi Gị
M eji ozi a na-enye site na Google Analytics ka ọghọ ụzọ ndị na-eje Saịtị na-eji ya, nwee ihe pụtara mma na ndụmọdụ ndị na-eji ya, nlegta traffic patterns, na mọnịta Saịtị ọrụ.
M eji ozi a enye site na angel investment enquiries iji nwee okwu ohere investment mmanụ, kpọkọtaụ na ndị guzobere, na ụgbọ akwụkwọ nke investment-related ọkọtọ.
Google Analytics

Saịtị ntị eji Google Analytics, ọrụ nke a na-achikwa site na Google LLC. Google Analytics eji cookies iji nyere aka nlegta olee otụtụ ndị na-eji Saịtị na-eji ya. Maka ozi ndị ọzọ banyere olee otụtụ Google eji ihe, biko ije: [Google's Privacy Policy](https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites)
Ịpụ Ụzọ
Ị pụrụ ịpụ n'Google Analytics site n'iyi [Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on](https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout) ma ọ bụ gbanwee browser gị mee ụzọ ịgbachiri ma ọ bụ kpochapụ cookies.
Cookies
Cookies bụ obere akwụkwọ nke arụ na ihe gị. Saịtị ntị eji cookies naanị site na Google Analytics maka ihe nkọwa ndị a. Ị pụrụ ịchịkwa cookie preferences site na browser gị zina.
Ụgbọ Akwụkwọ Ndụ
Google Analytics ozi na-azụ maka ọnwa 26 site n'ụbọchị enwe, mgbe nke ahụ e jụpụ ya. Ozi a enye site na angel investment enquiries na-azụ maka olee otụtụ o dị mkpa ma ọ bụ ihe iwu kwu.
Angel Investment Communications
Ọ bụrụ na ị zite m pitch akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ozi ndị ọzọ investment-related:

items: M ga-anata ozi gị na nlekọta ziri ezi
M nwere ike ikekọ ozi na ndị ọkpụkpụ ọrụ n'okpuru confidentiality nchebọ ebe o dị mkpa
M enweghị ike ịkwarịko na-agbaghara mkpọmkpọ
M naagbaghị rere ma ọ bụ ekokarị ozi gị na ndị ọzọ maka ọkwa azụmahụ
Ị ekwesighị ịzite ozi nke ị naghị na-eche inwe ike ịkọkọ

content.content: Njikọ Ndị Ọzọ
Saịtị nwere ike ịnweta njikọ na saịtị ndị ọzọ. M abụghị ọkpụkpụ maka nzuzo usoro nke saịtị ọzọ. M na-agbalị ka ị lelee privacy policies ha.
Ikike Gị

Dabere n'ebe ị nọ, ị nwere ike ịnwe ikike ụfọdụ banyere ihe gị, gụnyere ikike ịnweta ozi mụ nwere banyere gị, arịọ mma nke ozi gị, igbachiri ọrụ, na nka nke ihe. Iji ikike ndị a, biko kpọkọtaụ m na hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Maka EU Ndị na-eje (GDPR)

Ọ bụrụ na ị nọ na European Union, ị nwere ikike ndị ọzọ n'okpuru General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Ihe iwu maka ọrụ ozi gị bụ ike mkpa n'imụ na nwee ihe pụtara mma na Saịtị, na angel investing communications, ike mkpa n'ihụ ohere investment mmanụ.
Maka California Ndị na-eje (CCPA)
Ọ bụrụ na ị bụ ndị California resident, ị nwere ikike n'okpuru California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), gụnyere ikike ịma ihe onwu ozi nwere ike ịnwe na ikike arịọ mma nke ozi.
Nwa Akụ Nzuzo
Saịtị ntị abụ ndị na-ebe ụmụ n'okpukru 18 afọ. M naagba ama ịenwe ụmụ akụ ihe ozi n'okpukru 18. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-eche na m enwe mma enwe ihe ahụ, biko kpọkọtaụ m iji ewepụ ya.
Gbanwee N'Policy Ntị
M nwere ike ịnwee Privacy Policy ndị a site n'ụbọchị ụbọchị. Ihe ọbụla gbanwee ga-akwụkwọ na ibe ntị na "Last Updated" ụbọchị gbanweere.
Ziri Ezi
Mgbe m na-agba mbọ iji chebe ihe gị, ọ naghị abụ ikike na ihe ahụ ịga ruo n'intaneti abụ 100% secure. M enweghị ike ịkwa ziri ezi ziri n'aka nke ihe a-ezite ma ọ bụ ipaghara na Saịtị.
Kpọkọtaụ
Ọ bụrụ na ị nwere ajụjụ banyere Privacy Policy ndị a, biko kpọkọtaụ m na hellolorimerjenkins@gmail.com.
Site n'iji Saịtị ntị, ị na-akwado iji na-enwe na iji ozi dịka akọwa na Privacy Policy ntị.

ProjectsPage.title: Ọrụ
ProjectsPage.roleAstro: CEO site n'enwe, onye angel gara aga
ProjectsPage.walletyDescription: [Polkadot](https://polkadot.com) & [Kusama](https://kusama.network/) ecosystem analytics website, nke na-achọ igosi ndị na-eji ihe ndị pụtara mma banyere akụkụ ha dịka ihe ọchocho, iji onwa, CSV export na ego akwụ n'ụgbọ ụgwọ netwọkụ. M zukọtarikwa ihe karịrị $100k na grants site na [Kusama DAO](https://dune.com/substrate/kusama-gov), nke e weghachiri ma ọ bụ na m chọ ịsonye [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com/).
ProjectsPage.othentDescription: Ihe okwu nke [Othent](https://othent.io) bụ ọnụ ndị na-eji ihe onwe online consumers na-ewe ohere iji blockchain ọrụ, na-enweghị iji ihe nkụ ngwapụta private keys wee eji Oauth akwụkụ dịka Google. Mbuuo m ọrụ ahụ dịka mma 1 njiri incubated na [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), ụlọ ọrụ software development nke guzobere [Tate Berenbaum](https://x.com/TateBerenbaum) na [Arweave](https://arweave.org) ecosystem. [Othent](https://othent.io) mechaa nwetaa [Wander](https://wander.app) n'okwu ngwaahịa ha, [Arweave](https://arweave.org) & [AO](https://ao.arweave.net) ecosystem Web3 wallet nke nwere ihe karịrị 50,000 ndị na-eji, na-eme [Wander Connect](https://www.wander.app/connect).
ProjectsPage.liquidOpsDescription: Ihe gbanwee na-agbanwee protokọl buoo na [AO](https://ao.arweave.net), na-achọ ibunyechi ihe karịrị $400m ama nke [Arweave](https://arweave.org) token ama. M co-founded ọrụ na [Marton Lederer](https://x.com/martonlederer), ghọọ mma 1 Fellow led ụlọ ọrụ iji pụ site n'aka [Community Labs](https://www.communitylabs.com), enweta ihe ọtụtụ [waitlist](https://x.com/Liquid_Ops/status/1863863983498805473?s=20) signups nke tolitere na $55m soft-commits maka echiche na on-chain fund verification, [pitched](https://x.com/aoTheVentures/status/1813676139795374171?s=20) na [AO Ventures](https://www.aoventures.io) demo day wee mechaa zukọta [$325k pre-seed round](https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/revolutionizing-defi-how-lorimer-jenkins-marton-lederer-are-transforming-arweave-liquidops-1729945). Ọ na- lansị mainnet, enwe ihe ọtụtụ intergrations gụnyere AO Chrome/IOS/Andriod wallets [Wander](https://wander.app) ([demo ebe a](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ODxijaC0Dc)) & [Beacon](https://getbeaconapp.com) ([demo ebe a](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GeQ01-rBUPQ&t=11s)). Achọpụta na mezuo na-agbaki audits site na firms dịka [Spearbit](https://cantina.xyz/solutions/spearbit) & [Quantstamp](https://quantstamp.com/).
ProjectsPage.contentCreationDescription: M na-arụ mma ụdị vidio akwụkwọ na ihe ụfọdụ social media platform na na-akwado reels. Anya m maka ha ịbụ ụzọ dị mma iji buoo online community, igosi ụwa ihe na-arụ na ihe mmadụ ọhụrụ n'ebe ọhụrụ.
ProjectsPage.cryptoTeenDescription: [Crypto Teen](https://www.tiktok.com/@lorimer__jenkins) bụ cryptocurrency TikTok channel na-achọ ịkụziri Gen Z ihe bụ ihe gbasara crypto, na-ekpuchi echiche ihe na ịma mma n'okpuru Web3 blockchain akụkụ.
ProjectsPage.subsidisejsDescription: Subsidise JS bụ ngwa buoo iji nnyeaka [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) iji Bundie akwụkwọ ọnụ na rite ego gas maka ndị ọzọ akwụkwọ site na [ANS-102](https://github.com/ArweaveTeam/arweave-standards/blob/master/ans/ANS-102.md) Arweave netwọkụ usoro. M na-eclacọ iji nnyeaka ndị a n'ihe ọzọ na chọrọ ikpughe gas akwụkwọ ha, nke ga-eme ka ndị na-eji app Web 2 consumer nke buoo na Arweave naagbachịkwa rite AR tokens ka iji.
ProjectsPage.astroDescription: Astro bụ liquidity ngwọta buoo maka seamless nnyeaka na okpuru Web3 ecosystems. Site n'ijikọ ihe ọtụtụ stablecoins na fiat currencies n'ime otu, unified asset - USDA, Astro na-ahụ frictionless ama ọgụgụ n'okpukru real-world na on-chain ọrụ.
ProjectsPage.coolarweaveaddressDescription: Repo ndị a na-enwe ike ịmepụta ọtụtụ [Arweave 4096-bit RSA-PSS JWK's](https://medium.com/@perma_dao/wallet-and-did-in-the-arweave-ecosystem-5714877fe745) iji chọọ ihe mma na ihe pụtara mma akụkụ ngwọta. Claude ga-agba ama ihe mma akụkụ site n'ike na ihe ọ chọrọ maka.

WritingPage.title: Ihe Edemede
WritingPage.substackSignup: Debanye ịnatụ ozi edemede ọhụrụ site na imesezi.

BookshelfPage.title: Ọkọ Akwụkwọ
BookshelfPage.subtitle: Akwụkwọ nke nyere aka guzobe echiche m
BookshelfPage.richDadPoorDadAuthorBio: Onye nwere ike na onye ọkụkụ ọgụgụ ọmụmụ
BookshelfPage.richDadPoorDadNotes: Ihe dị mma mmalite ọkụkụ ọgụgụ na ịchọ ihe ka ọ dị mkpa karịa ụgwọ.
BookshelfPage.1984Notes: Akwụkwọ dystopian na-akasị na ma ọ ka nchikota.
BookshelfPage.zeroToOneAuthorBio: Co-founder nke PayPal na Palantir Technologies
BookshelfPage.zeroToOneNotes: O nye ihe nrụrụ maka ndị nwere echiche na olee otụtụ e sị bubuo monopolies na ịmepụta ihe ndị pụtara mma site n'ịjụ echiche dum iji chọọ ohere ọhụrụ, igbachiri asụ, na ibuo ụlọ ọrụ ndị pụtara mma.
BookshelfPage.hardThingNotes: Ọkpụkpụ ọnụ banyere ibuo na ijikwa startup. Abụghị ụzọ nka, naanị ihe nyata dị nma.
BookshelfPage.whatYouDoNotes: Fascinating nlegta nke ụlọ ọrụ omenala site n'ihe mgbe ndụ mgbe Toussaint Louverture gaa Genghis Khan.
BookshelfPage.spareNotes: Mkpughe ụzọ na etu Royal na mmanụ nke uto na ime ihe ìhe mmadụ public eye dịka royal.
BookshelfPage.riseAndFallNotes: Biography na-akọwa ihe ndụ nke Prince Andrew na Sarah Ferguson, site n'alịchapi ha tupu osii na ruo ugbua.
